item.title: Hugo and Obsidian workflow

item.title: Can This Old Laptop Handle Plex?
item.description: An Intel 7th Gen i5 is more than enough to run Plex.

item.title: How to Create a Bash Script and Make it Executable?
item.description: Put long commands in a bash script so you don’t have to remember them.
